properties.title: JRC flood hazard maps global
properties.description: The datasets included in this collection depict flood prone areas in the World for river flood events of different magnitude, i.e. different six return periods from 1-in-10-year to 1-in-500-year events. The maps have been developed using hydrological and hydrodynamic models, driven by the climatological data of the Global Flood Awareness Systems (GloFAS).
properties.underlying data: several data sources (see publication for further details)
properties.usage notes: Cell values indicate water depth (in m), based on an analysis from 2000-2013 (so roughly representing 2013)
